mapper.insert: insert into cart set customer_id=#{param1}, item_id=#{param2}, qty=#{param3}, total=#{param4}
mapper.select: SELECT a.item_id, SUM(a.qty) AS qty, SUM(a.total) AS total, b.item_name, b.composition, b.discount_price, b.price, b.image_path, c.uid FROM cart a JOIN item b ON a.item_id = b.id JOIN customer c ON a.customer_id = c.uid WHERE c.uid =#{param1} GROUP BY a.item_id order by item_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE item_id =#{param1} AND customer_id =#{param2}
